issue.title: [R] Cleanups for CRAN 1.0.0 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9574](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9574). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fixes a bad URL and removes arrow.so stripping, which unfortunately caused a failed incoming check.
